name: Primitive Stablizer
description:
Entry for LD 49 - theme: unstable.

TITLE: Primtivie Stablizer

You are in a jungle on a foreign planet and must stablize a portal long enough to get home.

How to play

Start the generator and keep the four pegs in the ground by hitting them with your hammer

(There are three  types of endings ).


Controls

W.A.S.D to move

Left shift to run

Mouse left click to interact

Tab/Esc pause menu

Game updates for fixes:

Fixed: Menu text difficult to read

Fixed: Pause menu continue button

Fixed : Count down timer format
